thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 93 of 625
thread.title: Renee McDougal

author: Renee McDougal
title: Renee McDougal
text: I have been watching the online reviews for Fabletics for a while now, I have also reached out to my friends who have used Fabletics. I finally decided it was time to try it on my own! Overall, I enjoyed the website, it was easy to use. I loved that they had outfits already picked out, they have every type of workout clothes anyone could want. My big dislike was that a lot of sizes (not just my size), were sold out! I found that frustrating, however, there were many other choices to chose from. I ended up going slightly overboard with my first order, mainly because I wanted the great intro prices and I wanted to try on a large amount of their clothing to really get a good feel for it. I saved a ton of money and I can't wait for my March 2nd delivery!
